summary: DRIVERS SIDE HEADLIGHT AND PASSENGER SIDE HEADLIGHT WILL GO OUT RANDOMLY AT ANYTIME BUT SO FAR BOTH HAVEN'T GONE OUT AT ONCE...  HAVE BEEN STOPPED BY THE POLICE NUMEROUS TIMES FOR THIS.  WHEN I TURN THE HEADLIGHTS OFF AND BACK ON AGAIN THEN THEY COME BACK ON.  THIS HAS HAPPENED IN THE WINTER AND AGAIN THIS SUMMER.  SOMETHING NEEDS TO BE DONE ABOUT THIS PROBLEM AS IT IS VERY ANNOYING AND DANGEROUS ESPECIALLY AT NIGHT.  *TR
